label: ball
caption: In the sun-drenched field, two energetic Dobermans, their sleek black coats glistening with dew, were in the midst of an enthusiastic game of catch with a ball that bounced and rolled across the lush green grass, their joyful yips and barks filling the air as they chased after it. The dogs' brown patches stood out against their dark fur, adding to their endearing appearance as they frolicked together, completely absorbed in their playtime ritual. As they tumbled about, the ball sailed through the air, its trajectory unpredictable, yet the Dobermans' agility allowed them to keep up with it effortlessly.
